table.name: vtiger_parssecurelogin
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_parssecurelogin` ( `active` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '1', `attempsnumber` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Number of attempts', `timelock` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Time lock', `allow_ips` text, `blocked_ip` text, `weekdays` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `login_disable` int(5) DEFAULT '0', `working_disable` int(5) DEFAULT '0', `time_starts` varchar(25) DEFAULT NULL, `time_ends` varchar(25) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_parssecurelogin_users
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_parssecurelogin_users` ( `id` int(19) NOT NULL, KEY `fk_1_vtiger_bruteforce_users` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_parssecurelogin_logs
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_parssecurelogin_logs` ( `login_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `user_ip` varchar(25) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `login_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `status` varchar(25) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `os` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `browser` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL, `unblock` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`login_id`), KEY `user_name` (`user_name`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci
